## Table of Contents

### Classes

* [`btrfs`](#btrfs): This is the main btrfs configuration class, definded types can be passed as hash via hiera.
* [`btrfs::config`](#btrfsconfig): creates pools and subvolumes as defined in ::btrfs::pools and ::btrfs::subvolumes
* [`btrfs::install`](#btrfsinstall): Installs the btrfs packages

### Defined types

* [`btrfs::pool`](#btrfspool)
* [`btrfs::subvolume`](#btrfssubvolume)

## Classes

### `btrfs`

This is the main btrfs configuration class, definded types can be passed as hash via hiera.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `btrfs` class.

##### `package_manage`

Data type: `Boolean`

Control whether the btrfs packages should be managed by puppet or not

##### `package_ensure`

Data type: `String`

set the state or version of btrfs packages which should be installed

##### `package_name`

Data type: `String`

See `data/` for defaults and OS specific values

##### `pools`

Data type: `Hash`



Default value: `{}`

##### `subvolumes`

Data type: `Hash`



Default value: `{}`

### `btrfs::config`

creates pools and subvolumes as defined in ::btrfs::pools and ::btrfs::subvolumes

### `btrfs::install`

Installs the btrfs packages

## Defined types

### `btrfs::pool`

The btrfs::pool class.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `btrfs::pool` defined type.

##### `type`

Data type: `Enum[raid1]`



##### `disks`

Data type: `Array[Stdlib::Absolutepath]`



### `btrfs::subvolume`

The btrfs::subvolume class.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `btrfs::subvolume` defined type.

##### `pool`

Data type: `String`



##### `mode`

Data type: `String`



##### `owner`

Data type: `String`



##### `group`

Data type: `String`
